instructions: From the Home screen, tap the Apps icon. Tap Camera . Tap the Settings icon. Under Storage Location , tap the storage location to use: Device Memory Card

From any home screen, tap Apps . Tap Gallery . Tap to open the folder that contains the items to delete. Tap Menu > Select . Tap the item(s) to delete. A green check appears on each. Tap Select all to select all items in that folder. Tap the Trash can . Tap Delete .
